comments.body:
If you do that, can you please add this too?
`Pos` can be called like a function too (and in fact it is in the CodeMirror's source)

``` typescript
    (line: number, ch: number): Position;
```

Yes, I can see it's `gutterMarkers` in the actual source code:

https://github.com/codemirror/CodeMirror/blob/master/lib/codemirror.js#L5114

Well done! :+1:
